Hero.title: The Ultimate Boilerplate for Custom Marketplaces
Hero.subtitle: MarketFlex provides a modular and adaptable codebase for developers to launch scalable marketplaces with minimal effort. Built with Next.js, Supabase and MercadoPago pre-integrated.

Features.title: Built for Developers
Features.subtitle: Minimize setup time and maximize customization

adaptability.title: Modular and Adaptable Code
adaptability.description: Project structure designed to facilitate modifications and extensions with clear, well-documented design patterns.

payments.title: Pre-implemented Integrations
payments.description: Functional code for MercadoPago ready to use and modify, including webhook examples and payment event handling.

revenue.title: Extensible and Customizable APIs
revenue.description: Well-structured RESTful endpoints that you can extend or modify according to your project's specific needs.

compliance.title: Implemented and Documented Security
compliance.description: Functional examples of Row Level Security (RLS) in Supabase, JWT authentication, and data validation that you can adapt to your requirements.

Templates.title: Implementation Examples for Common Cases
Templates.subtitle: Reference code to accelerate your project development

automotive.title: Automotive Marketplace
automotive.description: Examples of models, controllers, and UI components for vehicle listings with automotive sector-specific fields.

realEstate.title: Real Estate Platform
realEstate.description: Code for geospatial search, map integration, and specific components for real estate properties.

services.title: Services Platform
services.description: Reference implementation for rating system, availability management, and proximity search.

Pricing.title: Plans for Every Development Stage
Pricing.subtitle: From prototyping to production at scale

Testimonials.title: Trusted by Marketplace Developers
Testimonials.subtitle: See what our users are saying

testimonials.quote: MarketFlex's architecture allowed me to quickly adapt the code for our automotive marketplace's specific requirements. The design patterns are clean and easy to extend.
testimonials.author: Carlos Rodriguez

testimonials.quote: The project structure and Supabase integration make customization incredibly easy. I was able to modify the data models for our real estate needs without having to rewrite the base infrastructure.
testimonials.author: Maria Gonzalez

testimonials.quote: As a developer, I appreciate the balance MarketFlex offers between prepared code and flexibility to customize. It saved me weeks of setup while giving me the freedom to implement specific features.
testimonials.author: Juan Perez

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about MarketFlex

questions.question: What level of customization does MarketFlex allow?
questions.answer: MarketFlex is designed to be fully customizable. It's a boilerplate that provides a solid structure and functional components, but you will always need to code to adapt it to your specific needs. The advantage is that the code is well-organized, documented, and follows clear design patterns.

questions.question: What technology stack does MarketFlex use?
questions.answer: MarketFlex is built with Next.js, TypeScript, Supabase (PostgreSQL, Auth, Storage), Shadcn/UI, TailwindCSS, and MercadoPago SDK. It includes support for i18n with next-intl and themes with next-themes. You can modify any part of the stack according to your needs.

questions.question: What technical skills do I need to use MarketFlex?
questions.answer: You'll need experience with React/Next.js, TypeScript, and basic knowledge of PostgreSQL. Experience with Supabase is recommended but not essential, as the documentation includes detailed guides on its use in the project.

questions.question: How can I modify or extend the data models?
questions.answer: The structure uses JSONB fields for flexibility, but you can also modify Supabase migrations or add new tables according to your needs. The documentation includes examples of how to extend the data model while maintaining compatibility with future updates.

questions.question: Can I integrate payment processors other than MercadoPago?
questions.answer: Yes, although it comes with MercadoPago integrated, the code uses an adapter pattern that allows you to implement other processors like Stripe or PayPal. The documentation includes guides for these alternative integrations.

questions.question: How do I contribute to the project?
questions.answer: You can contribute by opening issues, sending pull requests, or improving the documentation. The CONTRIBUTING.md file contains detailed guidelines for correctly contributing to the project.

CTA.title: Start building your marketplace today
CTA.subtitle: Clone the repository, review the documentation, and start customizing according to your needs.

Cookies.title: Cookie Policy
Cookies.subtitle: Understanding how we use cookies on our platform

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.subtitle: Understanding the basics
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience and enable certain features to function properly.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences and settings.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to enable us to display relevant and engaging advertisements.

usage.title: How We Use Cookies
usage.subtitle: Our cookie usage purposes
usage.description: We use cookies for various purposes to improve your experience on our platform:

items.improve: To improve our website's performance and user experience
items.analyze: To analyze how visitors use our website
items.personalize: To personalize your experience and remember your preferences
items.remember: To remember your login status and other important information

management.title: Managing Your Cookies
management.subtitle: How to control cookie settings
management.description: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

options.browser: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings
options.preferences: You can update your cookie preferences at any time through our website settings
options.thirdParty: For third-party cookies, please refer to their respective privacy policies

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: How we protect and handle your data

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Our commitment to your privacy
introduction.description: At MarketFlex, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our platform.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: Name, email, phone number, and other contact details you provide when creating an account or making a purchase.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.description: Information about how you interact with our platform, including browsing history, search queries, and feature usage.

technical.title: Technical Data
technical.description: Device information, IP address, browser type, and other technical details collected automatically.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.subtitle: Our data processing purposes
dataUsage.description: We use your data for various purposes to improve our services:

purposes.service: To provide and maintain our services
purposes.improvement: To improve and personalize your experience
purposes.communication: To communicate with you about our services
purposes.security: To ensure the security of our platform

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.subtitle: How we keep your data safe
dataProtection.description: We implement various security measures to protect your data:

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard protocols.

access.title: Access Control
access.description: Strict access controls and authentication mechanisms to protect your data.

backup.title: Regular Backups
backup.description: Regular data backups to prevent data loss and ensure recovery.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: Adherence to international data protection standards and regulations.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.subtitle: Your data protection rights
userRights.description: You have several rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: Request a copy of your personal data that we hold.

correction.title: Right to Correction
correction.description: Request correction of any inaccurate data we have about you.

deletion.title: Right to Deletion
deletion.description: Request deletion of your personal data from our systems.

portability.title: Data Portability
portability.description: Request your data in a structured, commonly used format.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch about your privacy
contact.description: If you have any questions about our privacy policy or your data:

details.address: Address: 123 Privacy Street, Suite 100, San Francisco, CA 94105

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.subtitle: Understanding your rights and responsibilities when using our platform

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Welcome to MarketFlex
introduction.description: These Terms of Service govern your use of MarketFlex and outline the rules, guidelines, and agreements that apply to all users of our platform.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.subtitle: Your agreement to these terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using MarketFlex, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our platform.

conditions.title: Conditions of Use
conditions.description: You must be at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into binding contracts to use our services.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.subtitle: Your obligations as a user
responsibilities.description: As a user of MarketFlex, you have certain responsibilities:

account.title: Account Security
account.description: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account.

content.title: Content Guidelines
content.description: You must ensure that all content you post or share complies with our community guidelines and applicable laws.

conduct.title: User Conduct
conduct.description: You agree to use our platform in a manner that is lawful, ethical, and respectful of other users.

security.title: Platform Security
security.description: You must not attempt to breach or circumvent our security measures or interfere with the proper functioning of our platform.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.subtitle: Ownership and usage rights
intellectualProperty.description: All content and materials available on MarketFlex are protected by intellectual property rights:

ownership.title: Platform Ownership
ownership.description: MarketFlex and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

licenses.title: User Licenses
licenses.description: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use our platform for personal, non-commercial purposes.

infringement.title: Infringement Claims
infringement.description: We respect intellectual property rights and expect users to do the same. If you believe your rights have been violated, please contact us.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.subtitle: Understanding our legal responsibilities
liability.description: MarketFlex is provided 'as is' without any warranties or guarantees:

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use our platform.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.subtitle: Updates and modifications
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time:

notification.title: Notification of Changes
notification.description: We will notify users of any material changes to these terms through our platform or via email.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch about our terms
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service:

details.address: Address: 123 Legal Street, Suite 100, San Francisco, CA 94105

Subscriptions.title: Choose Your Subscription Plan
Subscriptions.subtitle: Get access to premium features and enhance your marketplace experience

faq.answer1: When you subscribe, you'll be charged immediately for the first month or year, depending on your billing cycle selection. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each period unless you cancel it.
faq.question2: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.answer2: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account dashboard. Your benefits will continue until the end of your current billing period.
faq.answer3: We offer a 20% discount when you choose annual billing compared to monthly billing. Look for special promotions that we run occasionally throughout the year.
